name: OAX
public_notice: Previously known as openanx, Website has changed from https://www.openanx.org/en/ to  https://www.oax.org/

description.en: OAX is an ERC20 token developed to fuel an open-source decentralized exchange platform “openANX” which provides an aggregated order book to increase liquidity; holds collateral for asset gateways to reduce credit risk; and features an off-chain, predetermined dispute resolution system governed by the Decentralized Autonomous Organization(DAO) to maximize consumer protection.

ico_data.short_desc: Real World Application of Decentralized Exchanges
ico_data.description: OpenANX is an open-source decentralized exchange. At its core is the Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO) whose governance model affects the way that that DAO behaves. openANX is run using ANX's technology and experience. ANX is a bitcoin exchange and debit card company based out of Hong Kong.
